name: webmidi
description: WebMidi.js makes it easy to talk to MIDI instruments from a browser or from Node.js. It simplifies the control of external or virtual MIDI instruments with functions such as playNote(), setPitchBend(), sendControlChange(), etc. It also allows reacting to incoming MIDI messages by adding listeners for user-friendly events such as 'noteon', 'pitchbend', 'songposition', etc.

webmidi.name: WEBMIDI.js
webmidi.tagline: A JavaScript library to kickstart your MIDI projects

scripts.library:build-and-commit-all: npm run lint && npm run library:build-and-commit-cjs && npm run library:build-and-commit-esm && npm run library:build-and-commit-iife
scripts.library:build-and-commit-cjs: node scripts/library/build.js -t cjs -c true && npm run typescript-declaration:generate -- -t cjs -c true
scripts.library:build-and-commit-esm: node scripts/library/build.js -t esm -c true && npm run typescript-declaration:generate -- -t esm -c true
scripts.library:build-all: npm run lint && npm run library:build-cjs && npm run library:build-esm && npm run library:build-iife
scripts.library:build-cjs: node scripts/library/build.js -t cjs && npm run typescript-declaration:generate -- -t cjs
scripts.library:build-esm: node scripts/library/build.js -t esm && npm run typescript-declaration:generate -- -t esm
scripts.website:generate+push-to-gh-pages: npm run jsdoc:generate-markdown+push && npm run --prefix website build && node scripts/website/deploy.js
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease && npm run library:build-and-commit-all && node scripts/release/release.js && npm publish --tag next
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run library:build-and-commit-all && node scripts/release/release.js && npm publish
